name: Near Pay
author: Vlodkow

sections.description:
NEAR is a decentralized application platform which is built atop the NEAR Protocol, a revolutionary public proof-of-stake blockchain
which uses sharding to scale and an innovative account model to make apps similarly usable to those on today’s web.

Plugin allow you to switch network (mainnet/testnet) to test payment functionality on testnet and then take real NEAR tokens.

Don’t have NEAR wallet? You can create it in few minutes:
– For mainnet: https://wallet.near.org/
– For testnet: https://wallet.testnet.near.org/
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release: Select network, wallet and customize your shortcode.

short_description: Shortcode that allow your customers to SignIn with NEAR Wallet and make payments using NEAR token.
